targets.rawSql:
declare @sql nvarchar(max);
declare @params nvarchar(max);
declare @sql_instance varchar(255);
declare @perfmon_host_name varchar(255) = '$perfmon_host_name';
declare @start_time_utc datetime2;
declare @end_time_utc datetime2;
declare @disk_drive varchar(255) = '$disk_drive';
declare @database varchar(255) = '$database';

set @database = case when ltrim(rtrim(@database)) = '__All__' then null else @database end;
set @disk_drive = case when ltrim(rtrim(@disk_drive)) = '__All__' then null else @disk_drive end;

set @sql_instance = '$server';
--set @perfmon_host_name = '$perfmon_host_name';
set @start_time_utc = $__timeFrom();
set @end_time_utc = $__timeTo();
--set @delta_minutes = $cpu_delta_minutes;
set @params = N'@start_time_utc datetime2, @end_time_utc datetime2, @disk_drive varchar(255), @perfmon_host_name varchar(255), @database varchar(255)';

set quoted_identifier off;
set @sql = "/* SQLMonitor - Disk Space Dashboard */
set nocount on;
declare @_latest_snap datetime2;
declare @_24hour_snapshot datetime2;
declare @_5day_snapshot datetime2;
declare @_10day_snapshot datetime2;
declare @_30day_snapshot datetime2;

select @_latest_snap = max(collection_time_utc)
from $diskspace_table_name ds
where ds.host_name = @perfmon_host_name;

select @_24hour_snapshot = max(collection_time_utc)
from $diskspace_table_name ds
where ds.host_name = @perfmon_host_name
and ds.collection_time_utc <= dateadd(hour,-24,@_latest_snap);

select @_5day_snapshot = max(collection_time_utc)
from $diskspace_table_name ds
where ds.host_name = @perfmon_host_name
and ds.collection_time_utc <= dateadd(day,-5,@_latest_snap);

select @_10day_snapshot = max(collection_time_utc)
from $diskspace_table_name ds
where ds.host_name = @perfmon_host_name
and ds.collection_time_utc <= dateadd(day,-10,@_latest_snap);

select @_30day_snapshot = max(collection_time_utc)
from $diskspace_table_name ds
where ds.host_name = @perfmon_host_name
and ds.collection_time_utc <= dateadd(day,-30,@_latest_snap);

--if object_id('tempdb..#db_disk_drives') is not null
--	drop table #db_disk_drives
create table #db_disk_drives 
(	disk_volume varchar (255), 
	[database] varchar (255), 
	[file_name] varchar(255), 
	type_desc varchar(120),
	file_size_mb bigint,
	index cx_db_disk_drives clustered (disk_volume)
);

insert #db_disk_drives
	( disk_volume, [database], [file_name], type_desc, file_size_mb )
select ds.disk_volume, [database] = d.name, [file_name] = mf.name, 
		mf.type_desc, [file_size_mb] = fis.size_on_disk_bytes/1024/1024 
from sys.master_files mf join sys.databases d on d.database_id = mf.database_id
outer apply (
		select top 1 ds.disk_volume	from $diskspace_table_name ds
		where ds.collection_time_utc = @_latest_snap and ds.host_name = @perfmon_host_name
			and mf.physical_name like (ds.disk_volume+'%')
		order by len(ds.disk_volume) desc
	) ds
left join $fileiostats_table_name fis
	on fis.collection_time_utc = (select max(i.collection_time_utc) from $fileiostats_table_name i 
									where i.collection_time_utc <= @_latest_snap)
		and fis.database_id = mf.database_id and fis.file_id = mf.file_id;

;with t_raw as (
	select	ds.collection_time_utc, ds.host_name, ds.disk_volume, ds.label, ds.capacity_mb, ds.free_mb
			--ds.block_size, ds.filesystem
			--,[prv_used_mb_delta] = (ds.capacity_mb-ds.free_mb) - (prv.capacity_mb-prv.free_mb)
			,[growth_24h_mb] = (ds.capacity_mb-ds.free_mb) - (prv_24h.capacity_mb-prv_24h.free_mb)
			,[growth_5d_mb] = (ds.capacity_mb-ds.free_mb) - (prv_5d.capacity_mb-prv_5d.free_mb)
			,[growth_10d_mb] = (ds.capacity_mb-ds.free_mb) - (prv_10d.capacity_mb-prv_10d.free_mb)
			,[growth_30d_mb] = (ds.capacity_mb-ds.free_mb) - (prv_30d.capacity_mb-prv_30d.free_mb)
			,[hours_to_fill] = case when ((ds.capacity_mb-ds.free_mb) - (prv_24h.capacity_mb-prv_24h.free_mb)) <> 0
									then (ds.free_mb * 1.0) / (((ds.capacity_mb-ds.free_mb) - (prv_24h.capacity_mb-prv_24h.free_mb))/24)
									when ((ds.capacity_mb-ds.free_mb) - (prv_5d.capacity_mb-prv_5d.free_mb)) <> 0
									then (ds.free_mb * 1.0) / (((ds.capacity_mb-ds.free_mb) - (prv_5d.capacity_mb-prv_5d.free_mb))/(24*5))
									else 0
									end
			,[days_to_fill] = case	when ((ds.capacity_mb-ds.free_mb) - (prv_30d.capacity_mb-prv_30d.free_mb)) <> 0
									then (ds.free_mb * 1.0) / (((ds.capacity_mb-ds.free_mb) - (prv_30d.capacity_mb-prv_30d.free_mb))/30)
									when ((ds.capacity_mb-ds.free_mb) - (prv_10d.capacity_mb-prv_10d.free_mb)) <> 0
									then (ds.free_mb * 1.0) / (((ds.capacity_mb-ds.free_mb) - (prv_10d.capacity_mb-prv_10d.free_mb))/10)
									when ((ds.capacity_mb-ds.free_mb) - (prv_5d.capacity_mb-prv_5d.free_mb)) <> 0
									then (ds.free_mb * 1.0) / (((ds.capacity_mb-ds.free_mb) - (prv_5d.capacity_mb-prv_5d.free_mb))/5)
									else 0
									end
	from $diskspace_table_name ds
	left join $diskspace_table_name prv_24h
		on prv_24h.host_name = @perfmon_host_name and prv_24h.collection_time_utc = @_24hour_snapshot and prv_24h.disk_volume = ds.disk_volume
	left join $diskspace_table_name prv_5d
		on prv_5d.host_name = @perfmon_host_name and prv_5d.collection_time_utc = @_5day_snapshot and prv_5d.disk_volume = ds.disk_volume
	left join $diskspace_table_name prv_10d
		on prv_10d.host_name = @perfmon_host_name and prv_10d.collection_time_utc = @_10day_snapshot and prv_10d.disk_volume = ds.disk_volume
	left join $diskspace_table_name prv_30d
		on prv_30d.host_name = @perfmon_host_name and prv_30d.collection_time_utc = @_30day_snapshot and prv_30d.disk_volume = ds.disk_volume
	where ds.host_name = @perfmon_host_name
	and ds.collection_time_utc = @_latest_snap
)
,t_space_summary as (
	select	ds.disk_volume, ds.label, ds.capacity_mb, ds.free_mb, 
			ds.growth_24h_mb, growth_5d_mb, growth_10d_mb, growth_30d_mb, 
			[hours_to_fill] = case when sign(hours_to_fill) = -1 then 0.0 else convert(numeric(20,2),hours_to_fill) end, 
			[days_to_fill] = case when sign(days_to_fill) = -1 then 0.0 else convert(numeric(20,2),days_to_fill) end
	from t_raw ds
)
select 	[disk_volume] = s.disk_volume, s.label, s.capacity_mb, s.free_mb, 
				[used_percentage] = 100.0-(s.free_mb*100.0/s.capacity_mb),
				[db_files_usage_percentage] = ([file_size_mb]*100.0)/s.capacity_mb,
				dd.dbs, 
				[file_types] = STUFF((SELECT ', ' + type_desc [text()]
										FROM (	select distinct type_desc from #db_disk_drives dd 
												where dd.disk_volume = s.disk_volume 
											) ft
										FOR XML PATH(''), TYPE)
										.value('.','varchar(255)'),1,2,' '),
				s.growth_24h_mb, s.growth_5d_mb, s.growth_10d_mb, s.growth_30d_mb,
				[hours_to_fill] = case when [hours_to_fill] <= ([days_to_fill]*24) then [hours_to_fill] else ([days_to_fill]*24) end
from t_space_summary s
"+(case when @database is null then 'outer' else 'cross' end)+" apply (
		select	[dbs] = count( distinct [database] ),
				[file_size_mb] = sum(file_size_mb)
		from #db_disk_drives dd 
		where dd.disk_volume = s.disk_volume
		"+(case when @database is null then '-- ' else '' end)+"and dd.[database] = @database
		group by dd.disk_volume
	) dd
where 1 = 1
"+(case when @disk_drive is null then '-- ' else '' end)+"and s.disk_volume = @disk_drive
"
set quoted_identifier on;

--if (@sql_instance = SERVERPROPERTY('SERVERNAME'))
if ($is_local = 1)
  exec dbo.sp_executesql @sql, @params, @start_time_utc, @end_time_utc, @disk_drive, @perfmon_host_name, @database;
else
  exec [$server].[$dba_db].dbo.sp_executesql @sql, @params, @start_time_utc, @end_time_utc, @disk_drive, @perfmon_host_name, @database;

panels.title: Db File Size - Usage - Latest Snapshot @ ${fileiostats_collection_time_utc:date:YYYY-MM-DD HH.mm}_____ - [$fqdn] - [$ip]

list.label: Sql Instance
list.name: server

list.label: Is Local SQL Instance
list.name: is_local

list.label: DBA Database
list.name: dba_db

list.label: Host Name
list.name: perfmon_host_name

list.label: Current Host Name
list.name: host_name

list.label: IP Address
list.name: ip

list.label: Disk Space Collection Time UTC
list.name: diskspace_collection_time_utc

list.label: SQL Schedulers
list.name: sql_schedulers

list.label: SqlInstance Start Time UTC
list.name: sqlserver_start_time_utc

list.label: Disk Drive
list.name: disk_drive

list.label: Database
list.name: database

list.label: File IO Stats Collection Time
list.name: fileiostats_collection_time_utc
